de.thkoeln.bibl.api.lms.slnp.transfer

Class Response<T extends ResponseMessage>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.thkoeln.bibl.api.lms.slnp.transfer.Transfer<T>
      • de.thkoeln.bibl.api.lms.slnp.transfer.Response<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of messages the Response uses for communication
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConnectResponse, DefaultResponse

    public class Response<T extends ResponseMessage>
extends Transfer<T>
    Implements a generic SLNP response. A Response can be used to receive data from the SLNP server. It uses messages of type ResponseMessage to communicate with the SLNP server.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Response(Connectable con, java.lang.Class<T> handler)
      Initialize a new Response with an object that implements the Connectable interface.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getError()
      Returns the SLNP error message if the response failed or null if request was successful.
      java.lang.Class<T> getHandler()
      Returns the response message class which builds the messages.
      boolean isFailed()
      Checks if the response failed.
      boolean isSuccessful()
      Checks if the response was successfully and has no errors.
      void receive()
      Receives the response from the SLNP server.
      void receive(Connectable con)
      Receives the response from the SLNP server using the supplied connection.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Response

        public Response(Connectable con,
                java.lang.Class<T> handler)
         throws java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException
        Initialize a new Response with an object that implements the Connectable interface.
        Parameters:
        con - a reference to a Connectable object. This reference will be used to communicate with the server
        handler - the response message class which builds the messages
        Throws:
        java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException - if the supplied response message class dosn't support the required initialization function

    • Method Detail

      • receive

        public void receive(Connectable con)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException
        Receives the response from the SLNP server using the supplied connection.
        Parameters:
        con - a reference to a Connectable object. This reference will be used to communicate with the server
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs
        java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException - if the received data has an invalid format for the defined response message type

      • receive

        public void receive()
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException
        Receives the response from the SLNP server.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs
        java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException - if the received data has an invalid format for the defined response message type
